name: Virtually Veil In Love
description:
What happens when a VTuber fan finally met the love of his live? Naoki, an overly passionate fan of a VTuber named Shirayuri Lilya, unknowingly meets the person behind the persona. How will this fateful encounter changes him  and those around him?

Hello~
This is a passion project that my friend and I started. It's our first time making a visual novel. Feel free to download, try it and leave some comments!

PS : English is not our first language, so we're terribly sorry if you found mistakes.
